about.heading: Personal Details
about.bio: I am currently a Programmer Analyst at Maximus Canada. I have an experience of 3 years in Full Stack Web Development, diving deeper into Machine Learning. I believe that to be successful in life, one needs to be obsessive with their dreams and keep working towards them.
about.interests: Machine Learning, Web Development, Cloud Computing

education.title: Masters in Applied Computer Science
education.body: I got to explore a lot of things and worked on several research-level projects which dealt with real-time data. Started my journey in machine learning as well, working on various projects like single-celled RNA sequencing.

education.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
education.body: Started with baby steps learning about concepts, exposed to Java, Python, web development. Involved in many hackathons and contributed to tech projects which helped college gain NBA Accreditation.

education.title: Technology Entrepreneurship Program
education.body: Selected as student ambassador. Gained exposure to Design Thinking methods and access to training sessions from world-renowned experts.

experience.title: Programmer Analyst - Maximus Canada
experience.description: First Canadian company srole focused on modernization and migrating legacy applications to Next.js. Gained exposure to healthcare standards (HL7, FHIR) and tools like RabbitMQ, Docker, and Azure DevOps. Technologies: Next.js, HL7, FHIR, RabbitMQ, Docker, Azure DevOps.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer (Freelancer) - Bearsight
experience.description: Freelance full-stack work developing Power BI reports and data integrations; gained hands-on Business Intelligence experience. Technologies: Power BI, SQL, data integration.

experience.title: Software Engineer - Virtusa Consulting Services
experience.description: Worked as a UI developer on projects for BT, spanning backend and front-end responsibilities. Hands-on with Spring Boot, Angular, and React (TypeScript); promoted twice. Technologies: Java, Spring Boot, Angular, React (TypeScript).

footer.about: Passionate Full-Stack Developer and Machine Learning enthusiast based in Canada. I believe in continuous learning and tackling challenges with creative solutions.
